lead_paragraph: MARSHALL--James J. Sept. 9, 1930 - Feb. 22, 2015 You have been gone only a year but it has been the longest year of our lives. Your presence and your love are sorely missed. Sheila, Alice, Kath, Claire, Jamie and JJ 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  MARSHALL, JAMES J

snippet: MARSHALL--James J. Sept. 9, 1930 - Feb. 22, 2015 You have been gone only a year but it has been the longest year of our lives. Your presence and your love are sorely missed. Sheila, Alice, Kath, Claire, Jamie and JJ 1/3
